title: mac os 10.10以上的开启端口转发-解决mac默认不开启1024以下端口权限问题

cells.data:
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OfficeDocumentSettings>
  <o:AllowPNG/>
  <o:PixelsPerInch>96</o:PixelsPerInch>
 </o:OfficeDocumentSettings>
</xml><![endif]-->

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <w:WordDocument>
  <w:View>Normal</w:View>
  <w:Zoom>0</w:Zoom>
  <w:TrackMoves/>
  <w:TrackFormatting/>
  <w:PunctuationKerning/>
  <w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>10 磅</w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>
  <w:DisplayHorizontalDrawingGridEvery>0</w:DisplayHorizontalDrawingGridEvery>
  <w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>2</w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>
  <w:ValidateAgainstSchemas/>
  <w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>false</w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>
  <w:IgnoreMixedContent>false</w:IgnoreMixedContent>
  <w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>false</w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>
  <w:DoNotPromoteQF/>
  <w:LidThemeOther>EN-US</w:LidThemeOther>
  <w:LidThemeAsian>ZH-CN</w:LidThemeAsian>
  <w:LidThemeComplexScript>X-NONE</w:LidThemeComplexScript>
  <w:Compatibility>

   <w:AdjustLineHeightInTable/>

   <w:EnableOpenTypeKerning/>
   <w:DontFlipMirrorIndents/>
   <w:OverrideTableStyleHps/>
   <w:UseFELayout/>
  </w:Compatibility>
  <m:mathPr>
   <m:mathFont m:val="Cambria Math"/>
   <m:brkBin m:val="before"/>
   <m:brkBinSub m:val="--"/>
   <m:smallFrac m:val="off"/>
   <m:dispDef/>
   <m:lMargin m:val="0"/>
   <m:rMargin m:val="0"/>
   <m:defJc m:val="centerGroup"/>
   <m:wrapIndent m:val="1440"/>
   <m:intLim m:val="subSup"/>
   <m:naryLim m:val="undOvr"/>
  </m:mathPr></w:WordDocument>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<!--StartFragment-->

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">转自</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://my.oschina.net/91jason/blog/546711" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#CA0C16;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">http://my.oschina.net/91jason/blog/546711</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">mac os 10.10</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">以上的开启端口转发<span lang="EN-US">-</span>解决<span lang="EN-US">mac</span>默认不开启<span lang="EN-US">102</span>以上端口权限问题<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">本人<span lang="EN-US"> 10.10.2</span>的<span lang="EN-US">mac os</span>，<span lang="EN-US">tomcat</span>想要在<span lang="EN-US">80</span>端口上启动，网上查了<span lang="EN-US">N</span>多资料都不行，只有这个方案可行：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">老版本的<span lang="EN-US">OS X</span>使用的是<span lang="EN-US">ipfw</span>设置端口转发，但新的版本特别是在我这个<span lang="EN-US">OSX Yosemite (10.10.3)</span>中，已经无法使用<span lang="EN-US">ipfw</span>，而是换成了<span lang="EN-US">PF</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">PF</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">配置端口转发的文章网上也有一大堆，但用下来没能解决问题，反而让我迷惑气愤，下面给出最为正确的配置：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">首先在<span lang="EN-US"> /etc/pf.anchors/ </span>新建一个<span lang="EN-US"> com.pow </span>文件内容如下<span lang="EN-US">:</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
rdr pass on lo0 inet proto tcp from any to any port 80 -> 127.0.0.1 port
8080</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
rdr pass on lo0 inet proto tcp from any to any port 80 -> 127.0.0.1 port
8080</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">其中<span lang="EN-US">lo0</span>为你<span lang="EN-US">ifconfig</span>时查询到的网卡的名字<span lang="EN-US"> 80</span>是<span lang="EN-US">tomcat</span>端口，<span lang="EN-US">8080</span>为你想转发的端口<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">注意<span lang="EN-US">: </span>在段落末尾一定要加换行，否则会报<span lang="EN-US">syntax
error</span>错误。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">然后使用<span lang="EN-US"> pfctl </span>命令检测配置文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">sudo pfctl -vnf /etc/pf.anchors/com.pow</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">添加到主配置文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">pf</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">启动时会自动装载<span lang="EN-US">/etc/pf.conf</span>文件<span lang="EN-US">,</span>因此将<span lang="EN-US">anchor</span>文件链接到<span lang="EN-US">/etc/pf.conf,</span>转发规则就会自动建立了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">在<span lang="EN-US">rdr-anchor </span>“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple/*</span>”下面增加：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">rdr-anchor </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">pow</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">在：<span lang="EN-US">load anchor </span>“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple</span>”<span lang="EN-US"> from </span>“<span lang="EN-US">/etc/pf.anchors/com.apple</span>”后添加：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">load anchor </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">pow</span>”<span lang="EN-US"> from </span>“<span lang="EN-US">/etc/pf.anchors/com.pow</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">最终修改后的<span lang="EN-US">pf.conf</span>文件如内容如下<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">scrub-anchor </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple/*</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;

color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple/*</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";mso-fareast-font-family:

rdr-anchor </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple/*</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";mso-fareast-font-family:

color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">com.apple/*</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";mso-fareast-font-family:

"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F"><br>
load anchor </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">“<span lang="EN-US">pow</span>”<span lang="EN-US"> from </span>“<span lang="EN-US">/etc/pf.anchors/com.pow</span>”<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">导入并运行<span lang="EN-US">PF</span>命令（关键）<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">一定要注意导入并允许运行<span lang="EN-US"> pf</span>的命令，一个是所有现在网上教程里写的下面这个：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">sudo pfctl -f /etc/pf.conf</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">上面这个在<span lang="EN-US">OSX Yosemite (10.10)</span>应该没问题，但在我的<span lang="EN-US">OSX Yosemite (10.10.3)</span>里是没有用的，要换成下面这个才能成功：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">sudo pfctl -evf /etc/pf.anchors/com.pow</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";
mso-fareast-font-family:"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">设置<span lang="EN-US">pf</span>开机自动打开<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">sudo pfctl -e</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"microsoft yahei";mso-fareast-font-family:
"microsoft yahei";color:#3F3F3F"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">添加的为<span lang="EN-US">-e</span>参数<span lang="EN-US">,</span>即<span lang="EN-US">enable<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"microsoft yahei",serif;
color:#3F3F3F">如果你想要关闭<span lang="EN-US">pf </span>，命令是<span lang="EN-US"> :<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:13.2pt;margin-left:
0cm;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"microsoft yahei",serif;color:#3F3F3F">sudo pfctl -d<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
